thread.title: Good ol' Penthouse offers $1 million for Trump golden shower tape
thread.title_full: Good ol' Penthouse offers $1 million for Trump golden shower tape

author: Heather Dockray
title: Good ol' Penthouse offers $1 million for Trump golden shower tape
text:
And who said investigative journalism was dead?
Last night, Buzzfeed published a mind-blowing 35-page memo alleging that Donald Trump may have been compromised by the Russians because of, among other things, a sex tape featuring him having sex with Russian prostitutes. Trump, who allegedly encouraged the workers to urinate on a bed, called the report "fake news" — and now Penthouse is offering $1 million for the tape.
SEE ALSO: Can we please stop branding compassion as 'liberal elitism?'
The memo had been circulating for months among journalists and politicians, but was never published in its entirety because the allegations couldn't be independently verified . So who better than Penthouse , a softcore porn magazine, to do the hard, real work of paying for the tape?
"We, along with the rest of the free world, are intrigued by the report alleging President-Elect Donald Trump employed sex workers to perform a 'golden showers' show in the presidential suite of the Ritz Carlton hotel in Moscow," Penthouse said in a statement to The Wrap . "However, while many media outlets are content running a story based on conjecture and rumor, we at Penthouse are committed to the value of getting the story right rather than getting it first. So we are offering up to $1 million to secure exclusive rights to the FSB tapes documenting Trump’s Russian hotel hijinks. After all, seeing is believing."
Penthouse stressed that they weren't trying to shame sexual diversity or people's sexual preferences. Instead, the magazine hopes to give the public information they deserved to know, including whether the PEOTUS had engaged in illegal, dangerous behavior.
Trump previously appeared in a 2000 softcore porn titled " Centerfold ."
It seems unlikely that the Russians would hand over this tape for $1million but at this point, truly anything is possible.
BONUS: New smart ball is a learning tool specially designed for autistic children
